verses.verse: <S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
<S%H4994>Oh<s%> let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>"
<S%H4994>Oh<s%> let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>"
<S%H4994>Oh<s%> let those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> "His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>"
From [my] <S%H4712>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3050>Lord;<s%> The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> me [and set me] in a <S%H4800>large<s%> <S%H4800>place.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is for me; I will not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to me?
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is for me among those who <S%H5826>help<s%> me; Therefore I shall <S%H7200>look<s%> [with satisfaction] on those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> to <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H120>man.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> to <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H5081>princes.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me; In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4135>cut<s%> them <S%H4135>off.<s%>

They <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me, <S%H1571>yes,<s%> they <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me; In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4135>cut<s%> them <S%H4135>off.<s%>

They <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> me like <S%H1682>bees;<s%> They were <S%H1846>extinguished<s%> as a <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6975>thorns;<s%> In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4135>cut<s%> them <S%H4135>off.<s%>
You <S%H1760>pushed<s%> me <S%H1760>violently<s%> so that I was <S%H5307>falling,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> me.
The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2172>song,<s%> And He has <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>shouting<s%> and <S%H3444>salvation<s%> is in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> The <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
The <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted;<s%> The <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
I shall not <S%H4191>die,<s%> but <S%H2421>live,<s%> And <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3050>Lord.<s%>
The <S%H3050>Lord<s%> has <S%H3256>disciplined<s%> me <S%H3256>severely,<s%> But He has not <S%H5414>given<s%> me over to <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> to me the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> I shall <S%H935>enter<s%> through them, I shall <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3050>Lord.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> through it.
I shall <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee, for Thou hast <S%H6030>answered<s%> me; And Thou hast <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
The <S%H68>stone<s%> which the <S%H1129>builders<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> Has <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H6438>corner<s%> [stone.]
<S%H384>This<s%> is the Lord's <S%H4480>doing<s%><S%H854>;<s%> It is <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> in our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>made;<s%> Let us <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in it.
<S%H577>O<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do <S%H3467>save,<s%> we <S%H577>beseech<s%> Thee; <S%H577>O<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> we <S%H577>beseech<s%> Thee, do <S%H6743>send<s%> <S%H6743>prosperity!<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is the one who <S%H935>comes<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> We have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H410>God,<s%> and He has <S%H215>given<s%> us <S%H215>light;<s%> <S%H631>Bind<s%> the <S%H2282>festival<s%> <S%H2282>sacrifice<s%> with <S%H5688>cords<s%> to the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>
Thou art my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thee; [Thou art] my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H7311>extol<s%> Thee.
<S%H3034>Give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H2896>good;<s%> For His <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%>
